title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.

title: A Man on the Inside Finale Recap: Did Charles Catch the Culprit? Plus, Grade the Season!
description: Charles revealed he solved the case of the missing ruby necklace in A Man on the Inside’s finale… but the answer was a little more complicated than we thought. The finale begins with Charles sitting solemnly in Didi’s office, with her insisting she’ll do this alone. But Charles offers to go with her: “I think […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: General Hospital’s Chad Duell Announces Exit: ‘This Wasn’t an Easy Decision for Me’
description: Chad Duell is scrubbing out from General Hospital. Duell, who has played Michael Corinthos on the ABC soap since 2010, announced he would be leaving the series in an Instagram post on Saturday. TVLine has reached out to ABC for confirmation. “After many incredible years with General Hospital, I’ve decided to step away from the […]
author: Claire Franken

description: Nostalgia, reboots and relaunches are everywhere. But only a handful of 2020-era shows are doing it right. The post TV Shows Doing Nostalgia Right (Without Making It Cringe) appeared first on TV Fanatic.
